result.html: Bhagair siad le gunnaí iadThey threatened them with guns.
result.ponchtml: Ḃagair siad le gunnaí iadThey threatened them with guns.

result.eng: He threatened the king with revenge.
result.ga: Bhagair sé díoltas ar an rí
result.orig: Bhagair sé díoltas ar an rí
result.html: Bhagair sé díoltas ar an ríHe threatened the king with revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ḃagair sé díoltas ar an ríHe threatened the king with revenge.

result.eng: He threatened that he would pull his party out of government.
result.ga: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtas
result.orig: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtas

result.ponchtml: Ḃagair sé go dtarraingeoḋ sé a ṗáirtí amaċ as an rialtasHe threatened that he would pull his party out of government.

result.eng: She threatened to take us to court.
result.ga: Bhagair sí an dlí orainn
